title: Untargeted analysis of hydrophilic metabolites using enhanced LC-MS separation with a pentafluoro phenylpropyl-functionalized column and prediction-based MS/MS spectrum annotation.
abstract: Wide-targeted metabolome analysis has been applied in studies on the biology of mammals, plants, and microorganisms. However, there are still issues regarding both analytical and informatics technologies for establishing an untargeted and comprehensive analysis of hydrophilic primary and secondary metabolites.
journal: Metabolomics : Official journal of the Metabolomic Society
